TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MenuDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider
Public Class MenuDesigner Inherits HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner Implements IDataBindingSchemaProvider
type MenuDesigner = class inherit HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner interface IDataBindingSchemaProvider

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具 (Visual Designer) 中，為 控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供階層式功能表 Web 伺服器控制項。The class provides a hierarchical menu Web server control. 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換至 [設計] 檢視中，標記來源描述相關聯的程式碼控制會經過剖析，而在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the associated control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當您切換回原始碼檢視時，以設計階段控制項保存到標記並新增至現有的 Web 網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup and added to the existing markup for the Web page. 類別提供設計階段支援視覺化設計工具中的控制項。The class provides design-time support for controls in a visual designer. 屬性會傳回物件，其中通常包含物件衍生自繼承樹狀結構中的每個層級的設計工具中的類別。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. 屬性會傳回集合的格式化配置中顯示**自動格式化** 對話方塊。The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. 屬性會傳回範本的相關聯的樣板群組集合控制項。The property returns a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated control. 屬性一律會傳回`true`，指出設計工具會建立相關聯的暫存複本本來產生設計階段標記。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated to generate the design-time markup. 類別方法提供下列功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法準備設計工具，來檢視、 編輯和設計關聯控制項。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. 方法會傳回用來呈現相關聯的標記在設計階段。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 方法取得的標記，在不需要標記為可用的設計階段呈現關聯控制項的預留位置。The method gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when no markup is otherwise available. 方法提供在發生錯誤時的設計階段呈現關聯的控制項的標記。The method provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred. - 方法繫結相關聯設計階段資料來源的控制項。The method binds the associated control to the design-time data source. 方法建構可在設計階段供關聯控制項的範例資料來源。The method constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 範例衍生`MyMenu`類別從。The example derives the `MyMenu` class from the . `MyMenu`類別是一份。The `MyMenu` class is a copy of the . 此範例也是衍生`MyMenuDesigner`類別從類別，然後再套用屬性`MyMenuDesigner`上`MyMenu`類別。The example also derives the `MyMenuDesigner` class from the class, and then applies a attribute for the `MyMenuDesigner` on the `MyMenu` class. `The MyMenuDesigner` 覆寫下列成員：`The MyMenuDesigner` overrides the following members: - 橙色，點線周圍繪製框線，使其範圍更明顯可見控制項的方法。The method to draw an orange, dotted border around the control to make its extent more visible. - 方法來產生標記的預留位置，其中包含錯誤訊息，這會呈現紅色，粗體文字。The method to generate the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. - 來產生標記包含一則訊息指出任何功能表項目所定義的預留位置。The to generate the markup for a placeholder that contains a message indicating that no menu items are defined. - 方法會擲回例外狀況，如果相關聯的控制項不是`MyMenu`物件。The method to throw an exception, if the associated control is not a `MyMenu` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 要繫結至設計階段資料來源的 。

span.span: The to bind to the design-time data source.

summary.span: 將關聯控制項繫結至設計階段資料來源。

span.span: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果其中一個下列條件為 true，方法可清除屬性，然後再呼叫基底方法：If one of the following conditions is true, the method clears the property, and then calls the base method: - 屬性不是`null`或空字串 ("")。The property is not `null` or an empty string (""). - 屬性不是 `null`。The property is not `null`. - 集合包含一或多個項目。The collection contains one or more elements. `dataBoundControl`參數是與這個設計工具或該控制項的複本相關聯的控制項。The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of that control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項的標記。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 字串，包含在設計階段用來呈現 的標記。

span.span: A string containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫方法繫結至相關聯的設計階段資料來源控制項，然後呼叫方法，讓控制項來產生其靜態-檢視和動態檢視的標記。The method calls the method to bind the design-time data source to the associated control, and then the calls the method to cause the control to generate its static-view and dynamic-view markup. 傳回目前的檢視標記。The returns the markup for the current view. 如果未定義目前的檢視，呼叫基底方法。If the current view is not defined, the calls the base method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class. 覆寫的方法變更為衍生自控制項的外觀控制項在設計階段。The overridden method changes the appearance of a control that is derived from the control at design time. 範例會繪製控制項，使其範圍更明顯可見，橙色，虛線框線，如果控制項的屬性是或值。The example draws an orange, dotted border around the control to make its extent more visible, if the property of the control is the or value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 在設計階段無其他標記可供使用時，取得為關聯控制項呈現替代符號的標記。

span.span: Gets the markup that renders a placeholder for the associated control at design time when no markup is otherwise available.

returns.span: 字串，包含在設計介面上呈現給替代符號的標記文字。

span.span: A string containing markup text that renders to a placeholder on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會產生指定的替代符號的標記控制名稱和一則訊息，指示您使用集合編輯器 加入項目。The method generates the markup for a placeholder that specifies the control name and a message instructing you to use the collection editor to add items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class. 覆寫的方法變更為衍生自控制項的外觀在設計階段的類別。The overridden method changes the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 此範例會產生標記包含一則訊息指出任何功能表項目會定義為關聯控制項的預留位置。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes a message indicating that no menu items are defined for the associated control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#5)]

span.span: The object that was thrown.

summary.span: 提供發生錯誤時在設計階段呈現關聯控制項的標記。

span.span: Provides the markup that renders the associated control at design time when an error has occurred.

returns.span: 包含標記的字串，此標記可用來在設計階段發生錯誤之後呈現關聯的 。

span.span: A string that contains the markup used to render the associated at design time after an error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會產生呈現錯誤設計階段標記控制項作為預留位置，其中包含的型別名稱、 控制項名稱和描述錯誤的訊息。The method generates markup that renders the error design-time control as a placeholder that contains the type name, the control name, and messages describing the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class. 覆寫的方法變更為衍生自控制項的外觀在設計階段的類別。The overridden method changes the appearance of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 這個範例會產生一個預留位置，包括錯誤訊息，以紅色粗體文字呈現標記。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message, which is rendered in red, bold text. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable GetSampleDataSource() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetSampleDataSource () As IHierarchicalEnumerable

summary.span: 建構要在設計階段供關聯的控制項使用之範例資料來源。

span.span: Constructs a sample data source to use at design time for the associated control.

returns.span: 實作 的物件，用來做為關聯 的資料來源。

span.span: An object implementing the to use as a data source for the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 範例資料來源，來建構方法有數個根功能表項目，以空的路徑。The sample data source that is constructed by the method has several root menu items with empty paths. 如果不定義了任何功能表項目在設計階段使用此範例資料來源相關聯之控制項，如果功能表無法繫結至資料來源。This sample data source is used at design time if no menu items are defined for the associated control and if the menu cannot be bound to a data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , which implements the interface.

summary.span: 準備設計工具，以檢視、編輯和設計關聯控制項。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計師會呼叫 visual方法時就準備好使用設計工具來呈現控制項。The visual designer calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 方法和其基底方法設定屬性和設定設計工具的運作所需的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`參數是與這個設計工具或該控制項的複本相關聯的控制項。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of that control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class. 覆寫的方法變更為衍生自控制項的行為在設計階段的類別。The overridden method changes the behavior of a control that is derived from the class at design time. 此範例會擲回例外狀況，如果相關聯的控制項不是`MyMenu`物件。The example throws an exception, if the associated control is not a `MyMenu` object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/CS/MenuDesigner.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner/VB/MenuDesigner.vb#6)]

exception.span: 「元件」不是 或屬於 的衍生類別。

span.span: *component* is not a or of a class derived from .

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property Schema As IDataSourceViewSchema Implements IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得設計工具的之目前的結構描述物件。

span.span: Gets the current schema object for the designer.

summary.span: 如需這個成員的描述，請參閱 屬性。

span.span: For a description of this member, see the property.

value.span: 設計工具目前的結構描述物件。

span.span: The current schema object for the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具簡介

span.span: Introduction to ASP.NET Control Designers

related.span: 逐步解說：建立基本的控制項設計工具的 Web 伺服器控制項

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 取得樣板群組的集合，做為關聯控制項的樣板。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the templates of the associated control.
A containing an element for each template in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得物件從基底屬性。The property gets a object from the base property. 接著它會加入至物件名為"`ItemTemplates`"，其中包含兩個名為"StaticItemTemplate 」 和 「 DynamicItemTemplate"的物件。It then adds to the a object named "`ItemTemplates`" that contains two objects named "StaticItemTemplate" and "DynamicItemTemplate". 屬性會傳回這給呼叫者。The property returns this to the caller.

related.span: 逐步解說：建立基本的控制項設計工具的 Web 伺服器控制項

span.span: Walkthrough: Creating a Basic Control Designer for a Web Server Control

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出設計工具是應該使用相關聯控制項的複本還是控制項本身產生設計階段標記。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a copy of the associated control or use the control itself to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為屬性一律會是`true`，在設計工具會使用控制項，其中包含一份相關聯的控制項來產生設計階段標記。Because the property is always `true`, the designer uses a control that contains a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控制項不會影響任何持續性物件。The control does not affect any persistence for the object. 如果已覆寫屬性來傳回`false`，在設計工具會使用相關聯物件本身產生設計階段標記和控制項的設計階段變更會保存到網頁的標記來源。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer uses the associated object itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control are persisted to the page markup source.

para.span: 您可以覆寫屬性來傳回或者判斷其中的控制項是否標示為類別層級值屬性。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level attribute.
If the is not overridden, the ignores the .
